To make your life a little easier this holiday season, we rounded up what we think are the best gifts for teens, based on our tech expertise as well as what our staff's teens are into right now. While they are still not as effective as good ol‚Äô manual labor, if you run them regularly, they will help keep your floors cleaner with much less effort on your part. articles.title: The new identity of a developer: What changes and what doesn‚Äôt in the AI era
articles.description: Discover how advanced AI users are redefining software development‚Äîshifting from code producers to strategic orchestrators‚Äîthrough delegation, verification, and a new era of AI-fluent engineering. The post The new identity of a developer: What changes and what doesn‚Äôt in the AI era appeared first on
articles.content: For the past four years, the conversation about AI and software development has moved faster than most people can track. Every week, there is a new tool, a new benchmark, a new paper, or a new claim about what AI will or won’t replace. There is certainly noise, but even if sometimes data seems inconclusive or contradictory, we still know more now than three years ago about AI adoption. With four years of AI adoption under our belt, we are also able to start seeing the shift in what it mean
articles.author: Eirini Kalliamvakou

articles.content: Despite making some moves to address the proliferation of AI-generated audio on its platform, Spotify failed to catch a copycat making imitations of music by King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizard. articles.content: Letterboxd has introduced its first wave of exclusive digital film rentals for the company‚Äôs previously announced Letterboxd Video Store. articles.description: Katsuhiro Harada is departing Bandai Namco at the end of 2025. He announced the news both with a farewell note shared on X and, in possibly the coolest exit ever, with an hour-long DJ mix. Harada's 30-year career has most closely been involved with Tekken and he's a familiar face in the figh
articles.content: Katsuhiro Harada is departing Bandai Namco at the end of 2025. He announced the news both with a farewell note shared on X and, in possibly the coolest exit ever, with an hour-long DJ mix. Harada's 30-year career has most closely been involved with Tekken and he's a familiar face in the fighting game community. He began as a voice actor in the original Tekken game and continued to do so even as he became a director for the series. He has worked on other Bandai Namco titles as a producer,

articles.content: This is today’s edition of The Download , our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. 4 technologies that didn‚Äôt make our 2026 breakthroughs list If you‚Äôre a longtime reader, you probably know that our newsroom selects 10 breakthroughs every year that we think will define the future . This group exercise is mostly fun and always engrossing, with plenty of lively discussion along the way, but at times it can also be quite difficult.

This group exercise is mostly fun and always engrossing, but at times it can also be quite difficult. We collectively pitch dozens of ideas, and the editors meti
articles.content: If you‚Äôre a longtime reader, you probably know that our newsroom selects 10 breakthroughs every year that we think will define the future . This group exercise is mostly fun and always engrossing, but at times it can also be quite difficult. We collectively pitch dozens of ideas, and the editors meticulously review and debate the merits of each. We agonize over which ones might make the broadest impact, whether one is too similar to something we‚Äôve featured in the past, and how confident we are

articles.title: Paramount tries to swipe Warner Bros. from Netflix with a hostile takeover
articles.description: Paramount has already proven it can get a controversial merger done.
articles.content: Netflix won the bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery‚Äôs (WBD‚Äôs) streaming and movie studio businesses last week. But Paramount Skydance isn‚Äôt relenting on its dreams of owning WBD and is pushing forward with a hostile takeover bid. On Friday, Netflix announced that it had agreed to pay an equity value of $72 billion, or an approximate total enterprise value of $82.7 billion, for WBD‚Äôs streaming and film businesses, as well as its film and TV libraries. The deal includes HBO and the HBO Max stre
articles.author: Scharon Harding

articles.title: F1 in Abu Dhabi: And that‚Äôs the championship
articles.description: A three-way fight down to the wire as the ground effect era comes to a close.
articles.content: The 2025 Formula 1 World Championship drew to a close this past weekend in Abu Dhabi, and with it came the end of the current generation of cars. After a grueling 24 races, the title was decided in a three-way fight by the finest of margins; just two points, less than half a percent, separated the winning driver from second place when the checkered flag waved on Sunday. Coming into Abu Dhabi, McLaren‚Äôs Lando Norris was, if not a comfortable favorite, then at least the driver with the highest odd
articles.author: Jonathan M. Gitlin

articles.title: A big bike on a budget: Lectric‚Äôs XPress 750
articles.description: A budget e-bike that offers more than you might expect.
articles.content: Almost every bit of bike testing I‚Äôve done starts out the same way. After assembling the bike, I set the seatpost to its maximum recommended height, take it on a short test ride, and try to figure out new and creative phrasing to describe the same old problem: The frame isn‚Äôt quite big enough to accommodate my legs. While I‚Äôm on the tall side at a bit over 6 feet (~190 cm), I‚Äôm definitely not abnormally large. Yet very few e-bike manufacturers seem to be interested in giving people my height a c
articles.author: John Timmer
